languages.text: "Я не сталкивался с данным утверждением и не готов подтвердить его. За кажущейся поэтической безобидностью может скрываться опасное искажение толкования Его заветов". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}-синтезатор внезапно начинает барахлить, из-за чего тембр Паскаля скачет, словно кривляющийся шут.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я не сталкивался с данным утверждением и не готов подтвердить его. За кажущейся поэтической безобидностью может скрываться опасное искажение толкования Его заветов". {n}Вокс-синтезатор внезапно начинает барахлить, из-за чего тембр Паскаля скачет, словно кривляющийся шут.{/n}

languages.text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я не сталкивался с данным утверждением и не готов подтвердить его. За кажущейся поэтической безобидностью может скрываться опасное искажение толкования Его заветов". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}-синтезатор внезапно начинает барахлить, из-за чего тембр Паскаля скачет, словно кривляющийся шут.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I have not encountered this statement before nor am I inclined to confirm it. Poetic innocuousness can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The vox-synthesizer suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pascal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

"I have not encountered this statement before nor am I inclined to confirm it. Poetic innocuousness can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The vox-synthesizer suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pascal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The vox-synthesizer suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pascal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

"I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

languages.text: “我以前并没有听说过这种说法，而且我不打算支持这种说法。充满诗意的陈词滥调虽然听起来无伤大雅，但这是错误的行为，是在曲解祂的戒律。”{n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}合成器突然发生了故障。他的声音忽上忽下，仿佛是小丑在愚弄别人一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我以前并没有听说过这种说法，而且我不打算支持这种说法。充满诗意的陈词滥调虽然听起来无伤大雅，但这是错误的行为，是在曲解祂的戒律。”{n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}合成器突然发生了故障。他的声音忽上忽下，仿佛是小丑在愚弄别人一样。{/n}

languages.text: «Nunca antes había escuchado esa afirmación y no estoy dispuesto a apoyarla. Los usos poéticos, a pesar de su apariencia inocua, pueden convertirse en un lienzo engañoso para la malinterpretación perversa de Sus doctrinas». {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}sintetizador comienza a fallar de repente, haciendo que el timbre de Pasqal salte más que un bufón.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nunca antes había escuchado esa afirmación y no estoy dispuesto a apoyarla. Los usos poéticos, a pesar de su apariencia inocua, pueden convertirse en un lienzo engañoso para la malinterpretación perversa de Sus doctrinas». {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}sintetizador comienza a fallar de repente, haciendo que el timbre de Pasqal salte más que un bufón.{/n}

languages.text: 「そんな言葉は初めて聞きましたし、支持する気にはなれない。詩的な決まり文句は一見無害に見えても、皇帝の信条を曲解するための偽りの姿にすぎません」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}・シンセサイザーが突然誤作動を起こし、パスカルの音が小ばかにする道化師のように高く飛んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そんな言葉は初めて聞きましたし、支持する気にはなれない。詩的な決まり文句は一見無害に見えても、皇帝の信条を曲解するための偽りの姿にすぎません」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}・シンセサイザーが突然誤作動を起こし、パスカルの音が小ばかにする道化師のように高く飛んだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe diese Aussage noch nie gehört und bin nicht willens, sie zu unterstützen. Poetische Plattitüden mögen harmlos wirken, können aber eine falsche Basis für perverse Interpretationen Seiner Dogmen bilden." {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Synthesizer hat plötzlich eine Fehlfunktion, sodass Pasqals Tonlage wechselt wie bei einem albernen Narren.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe diese Aussage noch nie gehört und bin nicht willens, sie zu unterstützen. Poetische Plattitüden mögen harmlos wirken, können aber eine falsche Basis für perverse Interpretationen Seiner Dogmen bilden." {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Synthesizer hat plötzlich eine Fehlfunktion, sodass Pasqals Tonlage wechselt wie bei einem albernen Narren.{/n}

languages.text: « Je n'avais encore jamais entendu cette expression et je ne souhaite pas la valider. Les platitudes poétiques, bien qu'inoffensives, sont des masques qui peuvent mener à une mauvaise interprétation de Ses doctrines. » {n}Une défaillance du synthétiseur {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} fait tressauter la voix de Pasqal qui passe d'un seul coup dans les aigus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'avais encore jamais entendu cette expression et je ne souhaite pas la valider. Les platitudes poétiques, bien qu'inoffensives, sont des masques qui peuvent mener à une mauvaise interprétation de Ses doctrines. » {n}Une défaillance du synthétiseur {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} fait tressauter la voix de Pasqal qui passe d'un seul coup dans les aigus.{/n}

languages.text: "Daha önce böyle bir beyan duymadım, onaylamaya da razı değilim. Şairane ifadeler, her ne kadar zararsız görünseler de O'nun ilkelerinin sapkınca yorumlanmasına kılıf oluşturabilir." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} sentezleyici aniden arızaya geçerek Pasqal'ın sesinin muziplik yapan bir soytarı gibi çıkmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have not encountered this statement before and I am unwilling to endorse it. Poetic platitudes, though they may seem innocuous, can be a false visage for perverse interpretations of His tenets." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-synthesiser suddenly starts malfunctioning, causing Pasqal's timbre to jump like a fooling jester.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Daha önce böyle bir beyan duymadım ve desteklemeye karşıyım. Önemsiz gözükseler de şairane klişeler, O'nun ilkelerinin sapkın tabirleri için yanlış bir örnek oluşturabilir." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} sentezleyici aniden arıza yapmaya başlayarak Pasqal'ın sesinin muziplik yapan bir soytarı gibi duyulmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
